name: AstroGNOMEy
description:
Move using the Arrow Keys or W A S D.

If you're on mobile, you can swipe in the direction you'd like to move.

You are the Gnome ambassador making first contact with some very WIGGLY aliens.

This is a super short game made on Christmas Eve for the Mushrooms Bitsy Jam.

AstroGNOMEy was made using Bitsy.
